aka: A Man Wishes for the First, A Woman Wishes for the Last
this_title: 남자는 처음을 원하고 여자는 마지막을 원한다
trans_title: 男人最先 女人最后
A Man Wishes for the First, A Woman Wishes for the Last
introduction: When Dongjun first met Hyeji on a spring day, he just knew she was the girl of his dreams. So he works up the courage to talk to her, and ask for her number-but Hyeji declines, saying if they ever meet again, she will then give him her number. That evening, Dongjun gets a call from his best friend and finds out there was a surprise waiting for him.
chinese_title: 男人最先 女人最后
foreign_title: 남자는 처음을 원하고 여자는 마지막을 원한다
